issues.title: Epic: Add Fire Codes Coverage (NFPA 30 & IFC)
issues.body: Track NFPA 30 and International Fire Code (IFC) adoption/changes via official public sources (no scraping paywalled code text). Deliver sources, scrapers, RAG integration, and notifications.

issues.title: Research: Identify public adoption/notice pages for NFPA 30 & IFC
issues.body: Find official state/municipal sources: Fire Marshal sites, ICC jurisdiction pages, public notices, errata bulletins. Capture URLs and ToS/licensing notes.

issues.title: Config: Add initial fire-code sources for TX, CA, FL
issues.body: Add adoption/notice URLs to state-website-data/state-website-data.json for TX, CA, FL. Prefer stable notice/updates pages.

issues.title: Generate scrapers and validate extraction (pilot states)
issues.body: Re-run generator. Validate selectors for notice pages. Verify updated/new_content/meta look sane for 2–3 pilot sources.

issues.title: Expand fire-code sources across remaining states
issues.body: Add adoption/notice sources per state and regenerate scrapers. Track gaps where public sources aren’t available.

issues.title: Indexer: Create 'fire-codes' collection and chunking
issues.body: Create a dedicated collection for fire-codes content. Chunk and store with source URLs and jurisdiction metadata.

issues.title: NLP: Extract citations (e.g., 'NFPA 30 §9.4')
issues.body: Entity extraction for code citations and dates; store in metadata for filtering and display.

issues.title: Prompts: Q&A templates for fire-codes
issues.body: Create question/summary prompts for jurisdiction-specific queries; ensure links back to sources.

issues.title: Notifications: Summaries + severity scoring
issues.body: Slack/webhook alerts that summarize detected NFPA 30/IFC changes with a rough impact score.

issues.title: Docs: Update README and ops guides for fire-codes
issues.body: Document coverage scope, legal note (no paywalled text), and usage examples for filtering fire-code sources.
